Your Internet connection appears to be w: Your Internet connection appears to be working. You can safely close this window and continue using your device.
elementary OS automatically checks your: elementary OS sjekker din internettilkobling automatisk når du kobler til et nytt Wi-Fi-nettverk. Hvis det oppdager at du mangler tilknytning, (f.eks. hvis du kobler til en inngangsgeleider på en kaffebar eller annet offentlig sted,) vil vinduet framtre og vise innloggingssiden.
Some networks can appear to be a captive: Some networks can appear to be a captive portal at first, triggering this window, then actually end up connecting. In those cases, you'll see this message and can safely close the window.
